A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a decent movie\, but felt more like a fan playing with his star wars action figures than an epic space opera. There wasn't the spark that existed in the first 6 movies (yes\, even the much maligned prequels beat this movie). \n\nAnd worst of all\, they turned jedi grand master Luke Skywalker into a grumpy hermit\, who would rather watch the galaxy burn than try to save it. Absolutely ruined my favorite film hero\, and now I can never watch the original trilogy again without remembering what hes supposed to become. He probably wouldve done the galaxy a big favor by just dying on the second death star with the emperor\, then become the man he did.
